text: Bhagwanpur Bujurg is a village in Kushinagar district of Uttar Pradesh. It is situated 28 km from Gorakhpur in the east. It is a major village of Kushinagar district situated on NH −28. The nearest railway station is 28 km from Gorakhpur railways station. The nearest airport is 25 km From Gorakhpur and 36 km from Kushinagar International Airport. Google Map Link Category:Villages in Kushinagar district
title: Bhagwanpur, Uttar Pradesh
